name: MTLArgumentType
desc: The resource type for an argument of a function.

items.name: case threadgroupMemory
items.desc: The argument is a pointer to threadgroup memory.

items.name: case sampler
items.desc: The argument is a texture sampler.

items.name: case visibleFunctionTable
items.desc: The argument is a visible function table.

items.name: case intersectionFunctionTable
items.desc: The argument is an intersection function table.

items.name: case primitiveAccelerationStructure
items.desc: The argument is a bottom-level ray tracing acceleraton structure for a set of primitives.

items.name: case instanceAccelerationStructure
items.desc: The argument is a top-level ray tracing acceleration structure for a set of instances.
